nawa nagi ena wyapara panthiya me thaththwaya hondin grahanaya karagath atharama, owun wada wadath athiriktha nirmanaya karamin saha eewa prathiaayojanaya karamin me yatithala pahasukam uparimayen saha nisi aakarayen bhawitha karanu labiya.awichchinnawa wardhanaya wu yatithala pahasukamme kriyawaliye prathipalaya wanija krushikarmayak sthapitha wima, krushikarmanthaya padaka karagath karmantha anshayak bihiwima saha eewa bara karmantha dakwa wardhanaya wima mangin rate aarthika kriyawaliya shakthimath wimayi.meyiji prathisanskaranawala mulika prathipaththiya wu yatithala pahasukam godananwima saha rajya aarakshawa godananwima hethuwen, rajaye wiyadam athi wishala washayen ihala giya athara, 1881 wasara wanawita aarthikaye uddhamanakari thaththwayak da moduwemin pawathini.eheth, shakthimathwa, awichchinnawa wardhanaya wu yatithala pahasukam saha rajya aarakshawa hethuwen ath karaganna wu aarthika wardhanaya me thaththwaya lath thanama samanaya kirimata tharam prabala wiya. 1945 di ath wu antha yuda parajayen pasuwa wuwa da, japanayata sarthaka sanwardhana mawathaka gaman kala haki wuye winasha wu yatithala pahasukam nawatha godananwima saha thawa thawath maha marga, dumriya marga, guwan thotupola, palam, waraya, jalaya, widuliya, godanagili aadi yatithala pahasukam sandaha aayojanaya kirima rajaye pradhana karyabharaya lesa salaku bawini.me pahasukamwalin uparima pala nelamin, manawa sampathin sannaddha wu paudgalika aayojana panthiya aarthika kriyawaliya shakthimath saha thirasara ekak bawata pariwarthanaya kale ya.
charma roga sharira abhyantharayata balapam karanu labana athara krumi aasadana ee athara pradhana we.
